levels.description: The next heal is increased to <@ba.vup>{heal_scale:0%}</> of ATK, and an additional target will be healed (prioritizes units under abnormal status) and granted <$ba.buffres>status resistance</> for <@ba.vup>{status_resistance[limit]}</> seconds
